Sentencas: A practical and feasible solution to reduce the global impacts from fossil fuels is represented by the locally distributed micro-cogeneration systems with high temperature solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) fed by biogenous fuel coupled in an energy distributed system.
Titulo: Evaluation of the Wheeler-Jonas parameters for biogas trace compounds removal with activated carbons

Sentencas: One of the main drawback is the low tolerability towards certain fuel impurities, mostly sulfur, chlorine and siloxane compounds.
Titulo: Evaluation of the Wheeler-Jonas parameters for biogas trace compounds removal with activated carbons

Sentencas: The opportunity to predict the breakthrough time of a gas cleaning section with a high precision level is mandatory to meet SOFC requirements.
Titulo: Evaluation of the Wheeler-Jonas parameters for biogas trace compounds removal with activated carbons

Sentencas: The reaction kinetic equation called the Wheeler-Jonas equation is adopted to estimate this breakthrough time.
Titulo: Evaluation of the Wheeler-Jonas parameters for biogas trace compounds removal with activated carbons

Sentencas: Two different commercial activated carbons were studied estimating the breakthrough time varying the operating temperature, the pollutant concentration (single and multiple effects) and the relative humidity.
Titulo: Evaluation of the Wheeler-Jonas parameters for biogas trace compounds removal with activated carbons

Sentencas: Results showed how relative humidity content affects inversely the removal performance for both sorbents.
Titulo: Evaluation of the Wheeler-Jonas parameters for biogas trace compounds removal with activated carbons

Sentencas: The Carbox sample, below RH 20% showed interesting results due to its metals content and microstructure.
Titulo: Evaluation of the Wheeler-Jonas parameters for biogas trace compounds removal with activated carbons

Sentencas: Here, relative humidity promoted the best condition to remove organic vapors from the biogas stream.
Titulo: Evaluation of the Wheeler-Jonas parameters for biogas trace compounds removal with activated carbons

Sentencas: Multiple contaminant conditions for both sorbent materials decreased the removal performance (t(b)).
Titulo: Evaluation of the Wheeler-Jonas parameters for biogas trace compounds removal with activated carbons

Sentencas: This decreasing for the Carbox sample ranged from a minimum of 44% to a maximum of 50% for H2S, and 70% for HCI with wet and dry conditions respectively.
Titulo: Evaluation of the Wheeler-Jonas parameters for biogas trace compounds removal with activated carbons
